climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Soft & Non-Shedding Rug】: Our area rugs is made of faux wool, soft cozy material is friendly to pets and children's skin.The low-pile black rug features high density , pile almost non-shedding.The ultra soft touch protects your feet from the cold and hard floors, bringing comfort and warmth to your feet.

【Trendy Moroccan Design Rug】: This farmhouse rug is designed with a Moroccan style pattern using a combination of geometric lines and shapes.The slight vintage feel created by the beige and black distressed tones helps to establish a nostalgic atmosphere.The bohemian rugs for bedroom aesthetic,ideal for promoting a cozy and inviting feel to your space .

【Stay Safe with Non-Slip Rug】: Our front door rug with high quality non slip backing material make our indoor doormats perfect for high traffic areas. Protect your loved ones from slips and falls, including kids, pets, and elderly family members. The lock edge design reinforcement make our indoor outdoor rug durable.

【Easy to Clean Washable Rug】: The black rug for living room is easy to care for and washable, Keep your rug looking fresh with daily cleaning using a vacuum.For a deeper clean, simply toss in the washing machine on a gentle cycle with cold water , air dry and not need add bleach.

【Multi-Purpose 2x6 Rug】: The runner rugs for hallway 2x6 is perfect for use as front indoor door mat,bathroom runner rug,rugs for kitchen, bedroom rug,entrance rugs indoor, porch rug,laundry room rug etc,this throw rugs can add a touch of luxury for your home, and it's also perfect for high traffic areas.
body.description: For a warm and inviting touch, choose our Moroccan Boho Tribal Distressed Rug, featuring modern colors and geometric lines designs. This boho-chic rug providing comfort and durability in high-traffic areas. Machine washable and non-shedding, this Traditional, Distressed rug will remain a highlight of your home decor for years to come.Features:1.Soft ,Non-Shedding2.Contemporary style with an moroccan pattern.3.Low pile height of 0.25 inches,allows for convenient placement in entryways and underneath furniture, and will not obstruct doorways.4.Easy to clean,daily cleaning using a vacuum,machine washable.5.Rubber non-slip backing,protect you and your loved ones from slips and falls.Care Instructions:Daily cleaning using a vacuumMachine wash in cold water at gentle cycle mode to deeper cleanUsing mild detergent, do not bleachTumble dry on low heat or lay them flat to air dry.If you have any questions during the purchase or use process, please feel free to contact us at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, but Very Pretty
reviews.reviewText: The pictures don't show you how soft it is. It was not the right size to work for an entry rug, which was I bought it for. But it is so beautiful I decided to keep it anyway. Swapped it out for an old rug in one of the bathrooms and it is perfect for right in front of the sink and the softness under bare feet is actually a much better use for it. I realize now it would be a waste to use something so pretty and plush just to wipe our shoes on. This really is a lovely little rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this rug!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the grey color as a runner in my kitchen. It’s better than I expected! I love the pattern, softness and most of all the fact that I can wash it when it gets dirty. I loved it so much I bought two smaller sized rugs for in front of my doors. Very satisfied with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my bathroom and I absolutely love these rugs. The print is beautiful, they are so soft to the touch and I love the low pile but squishy feel. They also dry very quickly. There was a little sliding on the linoleum but I secured them as I do with most of my rugs with a small dab from a hot glue gun on each corner. It doesn't hurt the material and easy to remove and reapply when they need washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s very nice
reviews.reviewText: It was very soft and seemed like it would wear well. Unfortunately the color was wrong for the room so I had to return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute rug but not for dryer
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two rugs. They look great. One is in the kitchen and one is in the entryway. Since I live in the midwest in winter, it didn’t take long before the rug needed washed (1-2 weeks), so I threw it in the washing machine as I knew it was washable when I bought it, or I wouldn’t have bought it. The stains came out well but the seams came apart in the washing machine. I went ahead and put it in the dryer. I read the description and it states to hang it dry so that’s on me. I gave the lower review as it isn’t as think as one I had from Kohl’s for a similar price or as big and that it can’t be dried. I can’t imagine how long it would take to dry and be without a rug. I would have snow and salt grime all through my kitchen and dining room without a rug there. So it looks pretty, is soft, but is lacking in durability. I am going to attempt to hot glue the edges as I am not up for cost of replacing it at this time. I also got it on a limited deal and it is no longer that price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the color and was really surprised at how soft and plush the fabric is! Feels like it’s pretty good quality too, will have to see how it holds up once it’s time to wash it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy care and good quality
reviews.reviewText: Soft, thick, easy to care for. What they don’t mention is spills pool on the rug and don’t sink it. Just throw a towel on them and they soak right up for easy cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So Soft! It washed well! Back has a non slip grip!
